original_text: ‘Call the nations to come and fight a battle against Babylonia. Wave a flag and make a noise with trumpets, so that these kingdoms prepare their armies to attack: Ararat, Minni and Ashkenaz. Choose a captain to lead them into battle. Send an army of soldiers on horses to attack, like a large crowd of locusts. ‘Call the nations to come and fight a battle against Babylonia. Wave a flag and make a noise with trumpets, so that these kingdoms prepare their armies to attack: Ararat, Minni and Ashkenaz. Choose a captain to lead them into battle. Send an army of soldiers on horses to attack, like a large crowd of locusts. ‘Call the nations to come and fight a battle against Babylonia.
korean_text: 땅에 깃발을 세우며 나라들 가운데에 나팔을 불어서 나라들을 동원시켜 그를 치며 아라랏과 민니와 아스그나스 나라를 불러 모아 그를 치며 사무관을 세우고 그를 치되 극성스런 메뚜기 같이 그 말들을 몰아오게 하라

sentences.original_text: Call the nations to come
and fight a battle against Babylonia
Wave a flag
and make a noise with trumpets
so that these kingdoms prepare their armies
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이 왕국들이 군대를 준비하게 하라

sentences.original_text: to attack: Ararat, Minni and Ashkenaz
Choose a captain
to lead them into battle
Send an army of soldiers on horses
to attack like locusts
like a large crowd of locusts
Call the nations to come
and fight a battle against Babylonia
Wave a flag
and make a noise with trumpets
so that these kingdoms prepare their armies
